statements: SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data WHERE source_ip='192.168.1.1';
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol='TCP';
SELECT MAX(packet_size) AS max_packet_size FROM network_traffic_data WHERE destination_ip='10.0.0.1';
SELECT MIN(timestamp) AS earliest_timestamp FROM network_traffic_data WHERE source_ip='192.168.1.2';
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, protocol, packet_size, timestamp FROM network_traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol = 'TCP' ORDER BY packet_size DESC;
SELECT id, destination_ip, packet_size FROM network_traffic_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT source_ip, COUNT(*) AS total_packets FROM network_traffic_data GROUP BY source_ip HAVING total_packets > 100 ORDER BY total_packets DESC;
SELECT MAX(packet_size) AS max_packet_size, MIN(packet_size) AS min_packet_size FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol = 'UDP';
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol = 'TCP';
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip, packet_size FROM network_traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM cybersecurity_events WHERE severity > 3;
SELECT event_id, event_type, description FROM cybersecurity_events WHERE event_type = 'DDoS Attack';
SELECT source_ip, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM cybersecurity_events GROUP BY source_ip ORDER BY total_events DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip, packet_size FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol = 'TCP' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT event_id, timestamp, event_type, description, severity FROM cybersecurity_events WHERE severity >= 5 ORDER BY severity ASC, timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip, packet_size FROM network_traffic_data WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.10' AND destination_ip = '10.0.0.2' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT event_id, timestamp, event_type, description, source_ip FROM cybersecurity_events WHERE event_type = 'Malware' AND severity <= 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, timestamp, protocol, packet_size FROM network_traffic_data WHERE packet_size > 1500 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data;
SELECT id, source_address, destination_address, bytes_transferred FROM network_traffic_data WHERE bytes_transferred > 1000;
SELECT destination_address, traffic_type FROM network_traffic_data WHERE traffic_type = 'HTTP';
SELECT * FROM security_events ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_type, description FROM security_events WHERE event_type IN ('Malware', 'Phishing');
SELECT id, source_address, destination_address FROM network_traffic_data ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT MAX(bytes_transferred) AS max_bytes FROM network_traffic_data
SELECT * FROM security_events WHERE event_type='Unauthorized Access' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT detection_id, event_type, severity FROM anomaly_detection INNER JOIN security_events ON anomaly_detection.event_id = security_events.event_id
SELECT source_address, SUM(bytes_transferred) AS total_bytes_transferred FROM network_traffic_data GROUP BY source_address HAVING total_bytes_transferred > 100000
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data;
SELECT id, source_ip, protocol FROM network_traffic_data WHERE data_amount > 1000;
SELECT destination_ip, protocol, data_amount FROM network_traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM malicious_traffic_data WHERE threat_level = 'High' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, threat_name, threat_type FROM cyber_threats WHERE threat_type = 'Ransomware';
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, data_amount FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol = 'HTTP';
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data WHERE data_amount > 1000 AND protocol = 'HTTPS';
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, action_taken FROM network_traffic_logs ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT threat_name, threat_type, threat_desc FROM cyber_threats WHERE threat_type = 'Malware' ORDER BY threat_name;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data;
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip, timestamp FROM network_traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT protocol, port FROM network_traffic_data WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT device_name, device_type, location FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'Router';
SELECT log_id, event_type, timestamp FROM traffic_logs WHERE event_type LIKE '%attack%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, timestamp FROM network_traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_name, device_type, location FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'router';
SELECT event_type, log_details, timestamp FROM traffic_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT alert_type, description, status FROM alerts WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY alert_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT incident_type, reported_by, description, timestamp FROM incidents WHERE status = 'open';
